data.quote: If you truly love life, don’t waste time because time is what life is made of.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: Don’t fear failure. — Not failure, but low aim, is the crime. In great attempts it is glorious even to fail.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: The great mistake is to anticipate the outcome of the engagement; you ought not to be thinking of whether it ends in victory or defeat. Let nature take its course, and your tools will strike at the right moment.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: Defeat is a state of mind; no one is ever defeated until defeat has been accepted as a reality.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: It’s not the daily increase but daily decrease. Hack away at the unessential.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: Do not allow negative thoughts to enter your mind for they are the weeds that strangle confidence.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: I’m not in this world to live up to your expectations and you’re not in this world to live up to mine.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: In order to control myself I must first accept myself by going with and not against my nature.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: Do not let circumstances control you. You change your circumstances.
data.author: Jackie Chan

data.quote: I prepare for the worst, but hope for the best
data.author: Jackie Chan

data.quote: I do small things. I try to do good things every day. If everyone does some good, think of what a good world this will be.
data.author: Jackie Chan

data.quote: If one does not attach himself to people and desires, never shall his heart be broken. But then, does he ever truly live?
data.author: Jackie Chan

data.quote: I never wanted to be the next Bruce Lee. I just wanted to be the first Jackie Chan.
data.author: Jackie Chan

data.quote: I allowed myself to be bullied because I was scared and didn’t know how to defend myself. I was bullied until I prevented a new student from being bullied. By standing up for him, I learned to stand up for myself.
data.author: Jackie Chan
